language.entry: Succubus
Revelation
Silent Curse
My Hero!
Scythe Swing
Harvest Reaper
Protect Your Goddess!
Demonic Leeching
Move
Revelation
Silent Curse
My Hero!
Scythe Swing
Harvest Reaper
Protect Your Goddess!
Demonic Leeching
INNOCENT PRAYERS
BEATIFULL PARASITE
BLIX TRIX
JUST ONE KISS
SOWER OF DISCORD
HUMAN WARMTH
JEALOUSY
Contract a Demon
+1 {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end}/rd for 30 rds
You will not believe what they say about you ... come, bring your ear to my lips.
Only I trust you. Don't deposit your faith in the smiles of others, they are just empty masks...
The divines told me that there's a traitor among us.
Somebody is sabotaging our quest! We oughta be careful...
Let's venture a bit, I will take your sorrows away...
Give me heat this night and I'll give relief of your burdens...
Come with me my dear, I will provide you special blessings.
You hear it? There is something in there... Come... Let's take a look together...
Here... Follow me, I want to share you a naughty secret...
My trustworthy friend, you and no one else will carry me through this darkness.
You are my true companion, stay with me forever.
Did you see the gaze of the others. They truly desire me!
I promise, it's just a friend!
It is not necessary to lose control. You are still my favorite...for the moment.
If you want my attention you will have to earn it. I warn you you have strong competition...
Im so grateful to be with you love.
I am sure that these prayers will fill you with vitality...
(Calm humming).
They are just a harmless goodnight prayers...
(Whispering unspeakable prayers).
(Whispers) y'agda omen laudarum ox...
(Dark whispers sprout from a malicious smile)
(Whispers) I will blossom inside your lust...
Can I take advantage of this? Hope you don't mind...
I promise you one of their souls if you trust your power in my hands..
Would you kindly hand this for me?
I need some protection... Would you lend me a hand?
Come to me, old friend. From the dark depths of the human soul I invoke you.
Blix, bring your imps with you and let them drag the sin away.
Hide inside my hood, so they do not see you...
Blix, I choose you !
Let me steal you a kiss... They won't even notice...
This will be our secret...
(Whispers) Promise you won't tell nobody... Okay?
Close your eyes, and come here...
I have seen how you look at me. Do not be shy ... I actually enjoy how your eyes run through my mouth.
Rusted Sickle
Sharpened Sickle
Immortal Scythe
Reaper's Scythe
"Widowmmaker"
Demonic Scythe
Cautivative Strings
Old Lingerie
Charming Lingerie
Enchanting Stripes
Seductive Stripes
"Wicked Pleasure"

Hiding under the disguise of a defenseless priestess, she slowly drains the life force from those around her, by using demonic curses and subtle mental control. When the moment is right she reveals her true nature, by summoning her demonic self, to bring havoc upon those that oppose her.

The Succubus does not immediately become effective in combat. She needs to absorb the lifeforce from living thigs around her, to feed the demon Blix residing in her scythe. Therefore her damage potential grows with the length of the dungeon.

During camping, the Succubus won't care about others. On the outside she offers consolation and friendship, but she is secretly weaving her strings in the backround, using a blend of manipulation, seduction and mind magic.
My dear, take care of the others these are mine
From whom do you come? Stolas? Paimon? Belial maybe?
Sorry but no...
Be more discreet and find another disguise. Two pilgrims is too flashy
A shadow over the light

It becomes increasingly difficult for pilgrims to reach our hamlet. Wanderers are dying on the old road and no one can understand what's the matter. Fortunately, not all travelers had such an unenviable fate.
Lust Moon

In such darkness it is difficult to know what is in the nearby, but even lying on ones bed, I think someone can take advantage of this situation for their own purposes. All the remaining Succubus will have a long night for themselves...
The dead pilgrims
A terrible incident! A group of pilgrims travelling on the old roads perished under strange circumstances. Only a single priestess survived. Do we have shelter for her in these dark times?
Crimson Runestone
Protect against the curse of the Succubus. Cure {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} from Party.
Cheatstone
Use to get 100% more EXP. Sell to gain 20000 Gold
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Come to me. I will be the mother of your rebirth..{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}The masquerade is over!{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Was about time... That damned crucifix gave me real itch.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Please... Don't get too cocky with me...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I can feel the love in the air.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Award my performance with a kiss... Won't you?{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Sorry my dears, but that coat was overheating me...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I know, I know... You hadn't seen anything alike me.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Now the fun begins.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}There is a room in the underworld for each of my enemies!{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}The harvest season has arrived!.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}A beautiful death comes to you my darling...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Now you don't need to guess anymore whats under that garb.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Oops my garb fell off, how clumsy of me... *Wink*.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Do not worry, I'll be gentle{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}It's time to make peace with your gods.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I can see your flesh clamouring for my hug,{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Don't be afraid, the kiss of my scythe will be soft and delicate as silk.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I will not miss those beads...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I am your deepest desires in the shape of death.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I will cut off your lives and feed on your darkest fantasies.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}It's hard to hide the wings under those rags...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}It has been SO funny to act for my audience...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I need several tongues to clean these boots... any volunteers?{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I will pluck your wings while you undress mine...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Kiss the tip of my tail and give your soul a privileged place in hell.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Do not be fool, you're still in time to run away...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}This is the kind of fun I needed.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}In the end, true nature always comes to light. It's useless to repress ...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Show your devotion!{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I love when they behave like puppies...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Your lust will be your fall...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Tell how much you desire me ...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Kneel before your true Godess.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Would you kindly die for me?{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I don't want to die, I'm still a virgin!... *Chuckle*...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Protect my purity!{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Please, I'm just a helpless priestess...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I need your protection. You are so STRONG...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}How brave! I might know how to thank you... *Wink*.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Strike this one, it wants to hurt me!!!{colour_end}
I will protect you! get behind me!
Don't fear, I'm here to save you!
I will kill anyone who dares approaching you!
Stay right behind me!
I'm here to avenge your crying!
Do not fear my love, danger in my company!
Ahh my dear, it must be centuries we last met!
You aged well my dear. Let's have a dinner of their souls like we used to
{colour_start|succubus_colour}The underworld awaits you!{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Awww... The sweat moans of dying.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Your sweet suffering really turns me on...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}There is only one thing that I enjoy more than crushing my enemies...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Too late to beg for mercy!{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Blood is my guilty pleasure.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Show me a piece of yur precious soul and I show you a piece of me...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Quiet now darling. This is just the beginning.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I hope you find pleasure on pain. I do for certain...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}You will be the next my dear, I promise you...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}You won't jump on the brink of death twice, be assured of that...{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}How courageous... Fleeing from a godess{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Death is for certain, you won't ecape forever{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}There is no hideout against real beauty{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Playing hard to get ? How amusing.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I will suck the last drop of energy from you!{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Hmmmm delicious!{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I can feel your life force clinging to my legs.{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}Your lust consumes your souls as flames do to dry leaves!{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}I can feel your energy deep inside me...{colour_end}
Darkness? Ahh yes... It's even better this way...
When all the lights go out, I can finally be myself.
Dark... We must keep closer to each other... Even closer...
I thought we had a deal!!!
Not me! Kill them first!!!
{colour_start|succubus_colour}-Replace me-{colour_end}
Devoted
{colour_start|succubus_harmful}Demonic Haunting{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_notable}Demonic Warden{colour_end}
Devoted
Haunted
Protected
Increase Nighttime ambush chance {colour_start|succubus_notable}"The Demon can change his mind for the better."{colour_end}
Prevent Nighttime ambush {colour_start|succubus_harmful}"The Demon can change his mind for the worse."{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_harmful}Demonic Haunting{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_notable}Demonic Warden{colour_end}
Devoted
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end}'s demon has changed its mind.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end}'s demon has changed its mind.
{colour_start|succubus_colour}The Demon has changed its mind for the better{colour_end}
{colour_start|succubus_colour}The Demon revealed its deceitful nature{colour_end}
No! I am not ready! Take them instead of me
Am I dying? But... I was promised for pleasure...
Why are these corridors so narrow!?
Why did I love darkness? The darkness is terrible...
Who is it rustling? Better we keep it that way...
Why did I left the monastery!?
Do you know everything? Why are you laughing!? You think you know all of me!?
It is a divine revenge. I knew it!!!
You went with me... Just to kill me... Right?
Hey! I heard he got a knife! Tell hom to get away from me now!
Wounds on the body only add passion!
Please... Hurt me! I want this!
Beat me! I want you to be rude with me!
It's not even a wound. It's a scratch! I can stand much more!
Fight, insignificant body, while I give you this opportunity!
Why didn't I drink you yet, weakling?
Why did they send me with such a rabble?!
You are so useless. Alone I would have handled it faster!
Freaks! I hate you all and your ugly nature!
I always have to do everything myself.
Should I go alone against the enemies and beat them all? Maybe you are one too!?
Are you even trying? Give me your strength and I will do everything much easier for you!
I'm too good. Behold me!
If you start to treat me as you should, then probably no one will start bleeding in the next fight!
And why did I ever agree to this!!?
We will die in this hole and no one will ever know about me...
I once loved...
Everything I've done so far, I've done it in desperation *Crying*.
Wait a minute, so we're still going there!?
Dark Father... Are abandom me? It's all strange.
Why do I even carry a scythe? This weapons aren't any convenient nor useful!
My unborn children followed me... I-I have a children... Right?
I left my cursed strength for good!
The evil spirits fall in the face of a TRUE goddess!!!
Why are you looking me like that? I can protect you with ease!
I'm not afraid of evil... because I am!
Higher forces demand more from me!
Now I understand how great our mission is!
I will chop down their bodies and reap their souls apart!
Even the demons are afraid of me now. They hid and bother me not!
There is always hope!
Do not give up! Together we will defeat them!
Do not be afraid! None of these creatures will hurt you while I'm around.
You can not defeat me!
I can be useful and not harm my friends!
I won't only take, but also give.
Here. Now it's easier for you.
Take some of my strength. I know that you can find me worthy of use.
Making enemies weaker, but my friends stronger! What could be nicer?
My strength is enough for everyone! Take as much as you can!
If everyone becomes stronger, nothing will stop us!
This one nun taught me this... I'm sorry that I could not thank her enough.
I'm better. And you?
Stop it! Please!
This madness will never end!
Why have we not retreated yet!?
You deliberately did it!?
You didn't covered me!
In addition to me there are three more, why is this not happening correctly!?
Spiritual suffering... Also acceptable.
My head is split in pain and I like it!
Can you use something more effective? An axe or a great sword!?
You all are so coward... Bunch of incompetent fools!
You are nothing but scared mice.!!!
With such a detachment... My soul is already bleeding...
This is for me!? Excellent... The rest is also mine!
I deserve more... Much more!
Why when I wanted to return, you dared to continue this trip!?
Why do everyone hates me?
Just leave me here? It will be better for all...
Aah! My skin is burning! Get rid of me soon!
I am a demon or a pilgrim? Does it mater any more?
My thoughts take on physical shape. Or is it they turn into my self-thoughts?
Protect me!!!
No... I'm afraid!
I rather escape!
Nah! You do not get me here!
You came up with all this! Now suffer your own!
No... They... They are everywhere!
Come on if you dare! Make me scream in pain!
I want pain! Tear off my skin!
Tear my flesh, drink my blood! I want this!
If I retreat, they attack. But what if I attack?
I want to stand here... I just want it...
Let me go to them! I can ask them to surrender!
I heard voices behind our backs! Quickly lets move!
If I attack, they attack too. What if I back away?
Poof! I hide in the shadows!
Kill me, I deserve it!
My Dark Father! I am going with you!
We will still die. So why do we wait!? Lets just give up.
Fight with them without me, I'm sad...
I... I do not want this.
I'd rather watch from far. Not in the mood right now.
Break up into the sides! I'm strong enough to stand in front!
Ahead are the strongest! Like me!
You prevent me from showing my best. Make a way!
Well, I do not. Better you than me!
Defend your Goddess, dunce!
You are ahead! And I'll cover you... Maybe.
No, I'm scared!
My hands do not obey me!
Save me! *crying*.
Aha! I know what you are trying to achieve! My answer is no!
I do not have to listen to you!
I got to you! You want to kill me! Well, I do not listen to you jerk!
I know better what to do!
Your decision is wrong. I'll keep mine instead!
Ha-ha-ha! What else!
And what will change? We are still doomed ...
I do not want to do this. Do not make me do it!
Wait! I have to comb my hair...
Hey! Where's my robes?! Who stole my robes!?
Is that a scythe? Stop it already! How would you kill anyone with that?!
No. I am a better healer! *Mumbling* Now healthy! See?
I know better what to do!
Now you see what your stupid orders have let us to!? Now I am on my own!
Not a bad idea, but... I can handle it myself.
There's too little blood for me! Give me more!
I know how to get MUCH more pleasure!
Now I'm on my own! Come on, hurt me!
I'll cut you in pieces, critters!
Enough of these ceremonies! It's time to fight!
Hate! Hate! Hate!
I know what to do in such situations!
I'm too smart to listen to someone like you!
Only me and no one else!
It would be better if you did it...
Maybe if I do this, my pain will subsided?
Do not waste your time on me. I do not deserve this.
But THEY told me to do it!
I'm not insane. You see? YOU SEE!?
It's time to harvest!
Do not touch me, I bite hard! R-rawr.
I'm scared to sleep alone!
What are you doing!? Seriously are you going to sleep here!?
They will certainly kill us. They will certainly kill us. They will cer... *Sleeping*.
I'll be watching you all night!
Among us there is a traitor. I know for sure!
I did not want to tell, but there are suspicions that we were specially sent here to die!
So little pain? I'll have to do everything for myself again.
Can any of you agree to become my executioner today?
Where is this damned flagellant, when he is so needed...
Everyone shut up and go to bed! Now!
Try and turn your back to me when I am turned on and you will die!
The stench of your bodies prevents me from falling asleep! Maybe you all can sleep in the corridor outside?
So... You, you and you remain in patrol. I need to sleep...
Shut up everyone! Your queen is tired.
Why should I sleep in the same room with all of YOU?!
My God. I saw his face again ...
I've done so little. I'm so embarrassed... *Sob*.
It will never end. While we are alive.
Couch! Bring me a couch! How? Why you did not take it again!?
I'll try to sleep today with my eyes open and maybe it will be better!
By the morning I will change the color of all my magic. You will see!
Kill me, you beasts!
The highest pleasure of pain is death!
I'm not hiding anymore! Kill me, I beg of thee!
I'm sick of it! I want to be gone!
Hey you! I began to cast out Armageddon! Try to stop me!
Schetan, unkhalah stragnsvoon... You all will die soon!
I figured you out! You betrayed us all!
The blood of demons is black. And yours?
Coward! I'll cut you to pieces if you do not start fighting!
Hit with a blunt end! Next time I'll hit harder!
You're too tall. Let me cut you a little bit. So it will be equal for everyone!
What is this on your shoulder? *Smack*. Uh... It seemed to fly away.
One deep incision and a whole lot of new emotions! Wonderful!
Oh! I started and you go on. Do not get upset slave!
Could it be that I will accelerate my end?
Too painful to continue. Too little to atone for guilt!
No! I am the first! First!
Want a trick with a scythe?! Oops, the focus did not work...
No! I know for sure that there are even more of them!
I will not back down! Not now!
It's funny. Are you trying to resist the imminent death?
Not now, when we are so close to deliverance!
Retreat? RETREAT!? Retreat And I'll stay here with my new friends!
So much pleasure... I will not go for anything!
Do not run! I already called for reinforcements!
There are thousands of us, but there are only four of them! The attackers are attacked!
For what? I'm just a lonely nun!
Really no one can stand up for my defense? It's so sad.
You did it! All of you!
It's more painful than I thought. But your treachery is still more painful!
Damn it! I told you to beat someone else you lamb!
Gah! What?! I am alone fighting again!?
Ay! You hurt me! Dont stop please...
Oh! Now hit me right here!
What are you? Hit me? Hey, everyone saw it!? He hit a girl!
Some strange sensations. It's not pleasant.
No! My scythe! It doesn't work! *Sob*.
But if I open my eyes, I'll see their ugly faces!
Someone sawed the shaft of my scythe! I got betrayed!
The devil deceived me! My strengths do not work!
No blood? This is a terrible game!
I gave you a chance sweetie. Take advantage of it!
Definitely had to took a sickle!
Uh-oh. I forgot the right words.
Hands off of him! This is my victim!
Stop it! I'm still not satisfied with his strength!
Ha-ha-ha! If you think this is a blow, then you are even more pathetic than I imagined!
Thanks, at least you did not missed dummy!
Why are you hitting him? This is our friend... Huh... Skippy!
Stop! You're hurting him!
Is it clear now. We are doomed.
Even if you could get on them, we still do not have a chance!
You have conspired! I knew it!
Yes, that's how it works! First mutual mistakes and then give me a children, right?
You... Ha-ha-ha! Hell no! You are so dumb!
Disgusting. Can I kill him myself? Why we have to get ridiculized to the enemies with this loser?
You missed? Not surprising...
Well babe, now I'll deal with the enemy and I'll take over you all!
Wow! He hooked it with his invisible magic blade! Have you seen?
Aha-ha, so it's all for fun? And how I did not immediately guessed it!?
Oh, Gods, his blood dripped on me!
No, do not die! Otherwise they will kill me next!
You did not even try to evade it! I saw it!
Well yes. Tell me again that you did not knew that they would attack you!
Him?! Why him! I also want to!
It's not fair! Beat me!
Weakling. Even the pilgrims in battle looked more worthy than you!
Can you still deign to block you idiot?!
Does it hurt you!? Awww... Such a baby...
Have seen blood, everyone can worry about him. And I will worry about the weapons!
If you continue to evade, sooner or later they will switch on me... So do not do that!
What? How is it? But I'm still scared!
Yes, they have fake weapons! They did it on purpose!
You knew he would miss it! You were not even surprised! I saw it all!
What a strange dance. Maybe it's you who are insane and not me.
Wow. Give him a second chance... Maybe he can improve better than you...
No. I'm not going anywhere!
Leave me alone! I'll stand here until you tell me what's your dirty trick!
Good try... but no. All remain in their place.
No! I want pain! Do not you dare deprive me of this feeling!
You have too few wounds sugar. I won't take your place.
Ha-ha-ha. Do you want to get dumped!? March and fight!
Enemies are in that direction you fool!
We can do it later okay? I am busy right now... Fighting with MY own monsters...
Do not push please... This is our first date!
Are you trying to poison me?
What is it? Take it back to the bag, I'm not going to use it!
No thanks. I am satisfied enough
Do not avoid me to enjoy my pain!
What for?
Why these pathetic attempts? If I have to die today... I will perish at once!
Is this wine? I will not refuse a glass of wine... If not... Take it back please.
And where to put it? I do not understand...
This is not helping! It's just making it worse... I knew it!
If I need treatment, I'll just suck you and that's it!
Treatment? I know what kind of "treatment" you want to give me... *Wink*. And my answer is no.
Why you die if you are not going to keep suffering from them?
No, leave me alone! It's good for me!
I will ask you about healing a little bit later... I'll choose the moment myself, okay?
I just want it to end. Leave me be!
Stay away! Stay away from me! I want to be alone! *Crying*.
No-no-no, I have my own methods, thank you!
I'm completely healthy! I do not need any treatment!
No! I will re-born like Jesus under a cave. Just let it happen!
Enhanced? Whom are you going to strengthen!? Hypocrite! I will strengthen myself!
There are no blessings... Only curses... Leave me!
No! It can spoil the amount of sensations!
If it does not hurt me, then there is no need! Go away!
Do not bother, I'm already in ecstasy!
Blessings? For me? No, I'm a sinner! *Cry*.
I do not deserve such favor. You better kill me!
No matter how hard you try to strengthen me, I'll remain as an useless courtesan... Do not waste your energies on me...
No.
No, you bless the angels who stood before us!
It's so cute! I will refuse of course... But I will reserve you some gift. Thank you!
Heads off from the shoulders!
The harvest is collected!!!
It is impossible to escape... It is impossible to hide!
Loosen and thrown away!
And they will forget you!
This is the end for you!
What is this magic?!
Hey! The last dance is mine!
Curses! I did not knew everything about curses!?
I'm almost sure that you will outlive this trip. Cheer up!
A good prayer removes tension. One friend told me once...
There are still herbs, some balms... I am sure you'll understand how to use them.
The drugs are there. Use them if you know how.
Oh, come on! Stick your finger into this hole and the blood will stop flowing!
And you know, I've always liked light-hearted chatter by the fire...
I remember my past fellows were very afraid not to wake up in the morning. But you are not like them... Are you?
But I can not go back to underworld! Do something with this! Quickly!!!
No. Someone is looking after us ... No.
What are you doing!? Someone will hear us and attack!
I'm afraid I won't be able to cast spells right now...
No. I do not want them to learn too much about me.
Oh! It seems I missed the ability! It's a shame, right?
Ha! Help this fools!? Are you kidding me?
They do not deserve it. Let them be helped by the experience of pain!
I will find myself a more pleasant pass time
My abilities do not allow me to hurt myself. So leave me alone!
Hah, it's funny. They think that I will help them... I hate to even talk to this dummies
Weaklings... Let them be helped by themselves.
Do you think that they deserve my help? They can go to hell!
I do what I want. And now I want to do nothing!
And why should I? I'm the best anyway.
No I do not want to do nothing. Leave me alone!
I can't. I'm too weak to cast real spells...
Baaaam! All are cured, blessed and stronger. I've done my job!
What? What do you want from me? I can not do anything!
No. Let them learn to dance at the moths!
Huh... I can't handle it myself. Stay away from me.
Better if you take the whip and punish me!
No! I want to suffer!
What? Is too much horror to help a damsel? You weak...]></entry> <entry id="succubus+str_block_camping_skill_target_abusive"><![CDATA[Do not even come near me! Do not even think about it!
Give me at least a couple of hours to be alone... P-Please...
I do not deserve this... Go away.
Such platitudes do not interest me! Try again fool!
Hah! Try to catch me first!
No! I will not share you the same food!
To poison me would be so sad... But from you everything can be expected!
I licked a little blood from my body. I'm full.
Food can also be suffering... And I'm hungry right now!
I'm so upset that I do not want to eat.
I am not hungry... Thank you...
Bring me wine! Quick!
No... I only eat nectar of life... Throw that dump away!

Blix!! Stop these shenanigans!
BLIIIX! YEEET!
Bad little Blix
My little cutie. You seem playfull today.
I should have fed you more souls.
You little Shit!!!...
Son of a hag!!! ...
Your mother is a THRALL!!!
It stole my ear!!!
This malvolent Imp... It ripped out a piece of my flesh !
I will dissect you!
Deceiver! I will bath you on acid!
You will be my new Subject! You flying vermin!!!
*Heavy snorts*.
*SNOOOORT*. (Throws the hook after the imp)
YES! YES! YES! Poke me again!
Sweet Pain! Sweet Deception!
Why did you stopped!? POKE ME AGAIN!
Why do we mess with this unholy creatures ?!
Malvolent Demon, your true nature is evil !
Malicious creature of the dark. Your betrayal was obvious !!!
Get of my head, impish creature...
*Screams in Pain*. It poked my eye!
Never trust a devil!
Tiny litlle filth! You won't get away with this!
I should have never trusted you !!!
REEE!!! GET AWAY !
Malevolent little Deceiver!!!
I didn't see that coming!!!
I thought we have a deal!?!
MY EYES!!! WHY HAVE YOU DONE THIS?!?
*Screams in Pain*. It poked my eye!
Arrrggghhh! Why in the good eye!!!
My Strength is refreshed! Here I go again!
I feel invogrigated! Here I come again.
The strength for a second blow!!!
I feel refreshed!!!
Sweet relief, delivered by an impish creature
The burden fell of my shoulders!!!
Come on Blix, lets's strike again!
Cute demonic friend. Lets show them what we are capable of a ssecond time.
I feel refreshed!!!
Sweet relief, delivered by an impish creature
Good little Blix! You eased me of my Burden.
